title: UDL-Based Instructional Design for Building Inclusive Educational Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of pedagogy and experience with online learning
context.additional_context: Development of instructional design strategies reflecting diverse learner needs in blended (face-to-face/online) environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three UDL principles (Representation, Engagement, Action & Expression) to actual instructional design.
Learners can design inclusive instructional materials considering diverse learner types.
Learners can plan UDL-based activities to improve engagement in blended learning environments.

resources: UDL (Universal Design for Learning) Guidelines Document

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
